Plot: For 16 years Miss Bentley has been spending April at an elegant hillside villa on Lake Como. This year, 1937, her London society artist father has recently died and the only other ...
Title: A Month by the Lake
Writer: H.E. Bates (story), Trevor Bentham, Josep Llurba (translation and adaptation)
Actors: Vanessa Redgrave, Edward Fox, Uma Thurman, Alida Valli
